content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 49, "index": 40}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an ender_eye, I need to craft blaze_powder first. To do that, I need to place a blaze_rod in the crafting grid. The blaze_rod is in slot 41, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 49, "index": 40}]
thought: I can now craft the blaze_powder by moving it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 49, "index": 40}]

thought: Now that I have the blaze_powder, I can start crafting the ender_eye. To do that, I need to place the blaze_powder in the crafting grid. The blaze_powder is in slot 12, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 49, "index": 40}]
thought: Next, I need to place the ender_pearl in the crafting grid. The ender_pearl is in slot 22, so I will move it to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 49, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the ender_eye by moving it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
